section.title: Configure pom.xml
section.para: The pom.xml file contains the processing instructions for your book. The recommended pom.xml to use is described in .

note.title: pom.xml alternative location
note.para: If you are having difficulty copying the pom.xml, you may find it easier to check-out the file directly from the SVN. Ensure you change the name from pom.xml_sample to pom.xml before using.

procedure.title: Configure pom.xml
procedure.para: In this procedure, replace the book_name placeholder with the name of the book you created.

step.title: Create a pom.xml file for your project
step.para: Create an empty file named pom.xml in the book_name directory.
The pom.xml file must be placed at the root directory of your book at the same level as the publican.cfg file.

step.title: Copy the base pom.xml
step.para: Take a copy of the base pom.xml described in .

step.title: Paste the base pom.xml into the file
step.para: Paste the base pom.xml information into the empty file.

step.title: Update the <docname> and <bookname> elements in <properties>
step.para: Replace the placeholder information in <docname> with the book_name XML file name, excluding the .xml file extension. Spaces are not permitted.
Replace the placeholder information in <bookname> with the title of your book. Spaces are permitted.

step.title: Save and close the pom.xml file
step.para: Once you have made the required changes specified in this procedure, save and close the pom.xml file.
